StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRecruitersByOrgId]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@OrgId int AS BEGIN
SELECT USMC.MapsSector.SectorDesignator Sector, USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngPerson.RANK_CODE + ' ' + USMC.vwMcrissPerson.LAST_NAME DisplayName, USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngPerson.rowguid
FROM USMC.MapsSectorRecruiter INNER JOIN USMC.MapsSector ON USMC.MapsSectorRecruiter.SectorID = USMC.MapsSector.SectorID INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on ON USMC.MapsSector.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId = USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on.rowguid INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngPerson ON USMC.MapsSectorRecruiter.Recrui.ngPersonId = USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngPerson.rowguid INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissPerson ON USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngPerson.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = USMC.vwMcrissPerson.PERSON_ID WHERE (USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on.ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgId) ORDER BY USMC.MapsSector.SectorDesignator
End
